keyword: how many calories in a dum dum
title: How Many Calories in a Dum Dum?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in a dum dum lollipop, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition breakdown for easy tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in a Dum Dum?
assumptions: Standard Dum Dum lollipop, approximately 3g, hard candy shell, no fillings or additions.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, and size; check packaging for exact values when available.

quick_answer.text: One Dum Dum lollipop contains about 20 calories, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Dum Dum with gum center (if available)

faqs.q: How many calories in a Dum Dum lollipop?
faqs.a: Approximately 20 calories per standard Dum Dum.

faqs.q: Are Dum Dums high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, one Dum Dum has about 5g of sugars with no fiber.

faqs.q: Do Dum Dums have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: No significant protein or fat; 0g each per lollipop.

faqs.q: How do calories vary by Dum Dum flavor?
faqs.a: Most flavors are similar at ~20 kcal; check labels for specifics.

faqs.q: Is a Dum Dum a low-calorie treat?
faqs.a: Yes, at 20 kcal, it's a relatively low-calorie candy option.
